result.execSummary:
This case has not been concluded. Unless a judgment of conviction is entered, the defendant is presumed innocent of all charges.

Notice to employers: It may be a violation of state law to discriminate against a job applicant because of an arrest or conviction record. Generally speaking, an employer may refuse to hire an applicant on the basis of a conviction only if the circumstances of the conviction substantially relate to the particular job. For more information, see Wisconsin Statute 111.335 and the Department of Workforce Development's publication, Arrest and Conviction Records under the Law.

Defendant Jordan T Schneider in court.  Attorney Heather L. Johnson in court for Jordan T Schneider.  Attorney Kenneth Olstinski in court for State of Wisconsin. 
Case in court for status conference. Defense received offer and requested trial date. State placed offer on the record. Case adjourned for final pretrial and for jury trial; Parties are advised that effective 10/31/2022, pursuant to Chief Judge Directive 22-17, this case will be reassigned to Branch 34, Judge Yamahiro in Room 423 of the Safety Building. Final pre-trial scheduled for January 13, 2023 at 08:30 am. Jury trial scheduled for February 27, 2023 at 08:30 am.
Justice Point Pretrial Services Supervision Report received and filed.  nk

Defendant Jordan T Schneider in court.  Attorney Heather L. Johnson in court for Jordan T Schneider.  Attorney Kenneth Olstinski in court for State of Wisconsin.  Deputy Court Clerk:  bm

Status conference scheduled for October 14, 2022 at 09:00 am.
Justice Point Pretrial Services Supervision Report received and filed.  bm

4/7/2022

Defendant Jordan T Schneider in court with attorney Heather L. Johnson.  Defendant Jordan T Schneider in custody.  Samantha Raygo appeared for the State of Wisconsin. PARTIES APPEAR BY VIDEO.  
Case set for a Preliminary Hearing. Parties are advised that this case is assigned to Branch 12, Judge David Borowski. Defendant waived Preliminary Hearing. Preliminary Hearing Questionnaire and Waiver received and filed. Court held colloquy with defendant. Probable cause has been found and the defendant is bound over for trial.  Original Information e-filed, copy given to defense counsel who waived reading. Defense enters a plea of not guilty on behalf of the defendant. Case is adjourned to Br. 12.  Scheduling conference scheduled for May 4, 2022 at 08:30 am.

Defendant Jordan T Schneider in court with attorney Heather L. Johnson.  Defendant Jordan T Schneider in custody.  Kenneth Olstinski appeared for the State of Wisconsin.  Deputy Court Clerk:  bm
Case calendared for State v Lee hearing.  Attorney Johnson has been appointed to represent the Defendant.  Case adjourned for Preliminary Hearing.  Preliminary hearing scheduled for April 6, 2022 at 08:30 am.

Case calendared for Status of Counsel March 25, 2022.  Attorney Heather Johnson appointed to represent Defendant but is unavailable that date.  Parties agree via email to March 31, 2022 at 1:30 pm.  bm

Defendant Jordan T Schneider in court with attorney Thomas Holland Reed.  Defendant Jordan T Schneider in custody.  Katie Ginsberg for Kenneth Olstinski appeared for the State of Wisconsin.  Deputy Court Clerk:  bm
Case in Court for State v Lee Hearing.  Attorney Reed advises they should have an attorney appointed by the next date and requests adjournment.  Status conference scheduled for March 25, 2022 at 09:30 am.
State Public Defender - Order Appointing Counsel received and filed.  bm

Defendant Jordan T Schneider not in court, defendant in custody.  Anna Marie Meulbroek appeared for the State of Wisconsin.  
Case set for a preliminary hearing. States witness is present. SPD has not appointed counsel. Court ordered case adjourned for CAUSE for a State V. Lee hearing in the trial court.  Hearing scheduled for March 11, 2022 at 08:30 am.

Defendant Jordan T Schneider not in court, defendant in custody.  Matthew Zisi appeared by video for the State of Wisconsin.
Case set for a preliminary hearing. States witness is present. SPD has not appointed counsel.   Court ordered case adjourned for CAUSE for a Preliminary Hearing in Preliminary Hearing Court, Room 146 of the Criminal Justice Facility.  Preliminary hearing scheduled for March 9, 2022 at 08:30 am.

Defendant Jordan T Schneider not in court, defendant in custody.  Matthew Zisi appeared by video for the State of Wisconsin.  
Case set for a preliminary hearing. States witness was present. SPD has not appointed counsel. Court ordered case adjourned for CAUSE for a Preliminary Hearing in Preliminary Hearing Court, Room 146 of the Criminal Justice Facility.  This hearing will be streamed live on Dacast:  https://iframe.dacast.com/live/4dafbf46-ed15-c11c-fa22-a58262833632/99073afd-37c2-acfa-830d-b1ddcaebf0ea  Preliminary hearing scheduled for February 14, 2022 at 08:30 am.
Signed and filed, No Contact Order.  Defendant to have no contact with B.S., MBS, NRS, any child under the age of 18

Court ordered defendant TURNED OVER TO Justice Point for Level 5 Supervision with Electronic Monitoring for the no contact order monitoring.  If electronic monitoring device is unavailable and cash bail has been paid, bail to revert to $5,000.  If Alternative bail is paid, Defendant to be released and placed on Electronic Monitoring waiting list.

Defendant Jordan T Schneider in court with attorney Stephen Andrew Sargent. Student Intern Maryann Corea under the supervision of Stephen Sargent. Defendant Jordan T Schneider in custody.  Katherine Seelow appeared for the State of Wisconsin.  Jordan T Schneider appeared by video means with Attorney.  Defendant is advised this case is assigned to Judge Borowski, Branch 12.  Defendant given a copy of the complaint and advised of maximum penalties, right to counsel and right to a Preliminary hearing.       Commissioner advised DNA sample has been obtained from the Defendant.  Court advised Defendant he may qualify to have the DNA sample data expunged if he meets the conditions under Wisconsin Statutes Section 165.77(4). Court reviewed the complaint and found probable cause to hold defendant for further proceedings.   DEFENDANT QUALIFIES FOR PUBLIC DEFENDER REPRESENTATION.
This hearing will be streamed live on Dacast:  https://iframe.dacast.com/live/4dafbf46-ed15-c11c-fa22-a58262833632/99073afd-37c2-acfa-830d-b1ddcaebf0ea  Preliminary hearing scheduled for January 18, 2022 at 01:30 pm.
Defendant in Custody, Court appearance today in Intake Court, Room 137A.
